Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Server. It requires 2 params to be executed: the ip address and the port of the server.

  • Method Details

    • getClient

      public static ClientHandler getClient​(java.lang.String nickname)

    • addToWaitingRoom

      public static boolean addToWaitingRoom​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Tries to join the specified player to a waiting room.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the new client.
      Returns:
      false if there are no waiting room available, else true.

    • newWaitingRoom

      public static void newWaitingRoom​(java.lang.String nickname, int mode)
      creates a new waiting room of the specified size and adds the specified client as a host.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the client that creates the waiting room.
      mode - size of the waiting room.

    • removeWaitingRoom

      public static void removeWaitingRoom​(WaitingRoom waitingRoom)
      deletes a waiting room.
      Parameters:
      waitingRoom - specified waiting room to delete.

    • addNickname

      public static boolean addNickname​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientHandler echoServerClientHandler)
      add a nickName and a handler
      Returns:
      false if the nickname is already used

    • removeNickname

      public static void removeNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      remove a nickname from the list

    • handleCrash

      public static void handleCrash​(ClientHandler client)
      called by clientHandler when crashes
      Parameters:
      client - references to ClientHandler

    • startServer

      public static void startServer()
      make the server able to accept new connections from the clients.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
